h2_title: Where to Find the Black Bear Guai
content: As a required boss, you won't be able to miss running into the Black Wind King. You can find him at the very end of the chapter by progressing through Black Wind Cave and up the mountain, past all of the wolf defenses until you reach Bodhi Peak.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Black_Bear_Guai.md", within the section "Black Bear Guai" and the sub-section "Where to Find the Black Bear Guai". The content is presented below:

As a required boss, you won't be able to miss running into the Black Wind King. You can find him at the very end of the chapter by progressing through Black Wind Cave and up the mountain, past all of the wolf defenses until you reach Bodhi Peak.
